participant_1.name: Ava Thompson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and optimistic, with a love for exploring the outdoors.
participant_1.background: I enjoy nature. I enjoy electronic music. I am in a lot of debt. I am failing some of my classes. I fantasize about living in another country.

participant_2.name: Jake Matthews
participant_2.personality: Passionate and determined, dedicated to horse racing and teaching others.
participant_2.background: I have made over 90,000 on trifecta bets alone this year. I am trying to open my own teaching program for horse racing. I hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses. I haven t been on a date since high school. I am a professional horse racing handicapper.

content.text: I'm really into nature. I love hiking, camping, and fishing. I also enjoy electronic music.
That's cool! I like nature too. I'm not much of a camper or fisherman, but I do enjoy hiking.
Have you ever been to any cool places in nature?
I've been to a few. I went to Yosemite a few years ago and that was amazing. I also went to the Grand Canyon and that was really cool too.
I've always wanted to go to Yosemite! It looks so beautiful.
It is! You should definitely go sometime.
I will!
What kind of electronic music do you like?
I like all sorts of electronic music, but I'm really into house music and techno.
I like house music too! It's so upbeat and danceable.
Yeah, it is! It's the perfect music to get lost in a crowd and dance your heart out.
I know, right? It's the best!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a professional horse racing handicapper.
That's cool! How did you get into that?
I've always loved horses and betting on them is a lot of fun.
I bet it is! I've never been to a horse race, but I've always wanted to go.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a lot of fun and you can make some money too.
I will! Thanks for the tip!
No problem!
